#summary verifies([only,except,post,get,ajax,cookie,session,params,handler])
#labels api,1.0

*Category*:

[ControllerInitializationFunctions Controller Initialization Functions]

*Description*:

Tells Wheels to verify that some specific criterias are met before running an action.

*Return Type*:

Void

*History*:

-

*Parameters*:

|| *Name* || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *only* || string || false ||   || Pass in a list of action names (or one action name) to tell Wheels that the verifications should only be run on these actions ||
|| *except* || string || false ||   || Pass in a list of action names (or one action name) to tell Wheels that the filter function(s) should be run on all actions except the specified ones ||
|| *post* || any || false ||   || Set to true to verify that this is a post request ||
|| *get* || any || false ||   || Set to true to verify that this is a get request ||
|| *ajax* || any || false ||   || Set to true to verify that this is an AJAX request ||
|| *cookie* || any || false ||   || Verify that the passed in variable name exists in the cookie ||
|| *session* || any || false ||   || Verify that the passed in variable name exists in the session ||
|| *params* || any || false ||   || Verify that the passed in variable name exists in the params ||
|| *handler* || any || false || false || Pass in the name of a function that should handle failed verifications (default is to just abort the request when a verification fails) ||

*Examples*:

{{{
<cfset verifies(only="handleForm", post=true)>
}}}

*Related*:

 * FiltersandVerification (chapter)
 * [filters filters()] (function)
